title: I Picked Up An Ancient Transmigration Killer To Be A Wife - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Romance   Yuri
tags: Assassins   Cunning Protagonist   Modern Day   Time Travel   Transmigration
author: 雨初白
description:
What? I’d even picked up a transmigrator when going out for a movie?I don’t want to be so lucky!

“Big sister, underwear is for wearing, not for holding things!”

En, I know, you like pie without the crust! “Waiter, get us a 9-inch pizza!”

Facing a killer’s courting, what should I do?

Yes, this is the story of an ancient killer transmigration into the body of a modern girl and living in a girl’s home.

Did I tell you that both are women?>
